column7: 1795-1883@addressee@Missionary of the London Missionary Society in South Africa 1816-70. Translated the Bible into Setswana

column10: 1821-1862@addressee@Eldest daughter of Robert Moffat. Married David Livingstone in 1845. Accompanied him on his early journeys
column11: but sent to England 1852. Returned with him in 1858
column12: but could not go beyond Cape Town. Rejoined him 30 January 1862
column13: and died 27 April 1862.@@@@letters@@autographs (manuscripts)@fragments (object portions)@Livingstone Online (http://livingstoneonline.org/)@25 October 1862@1862-10-25@Johanna@Anjouan (Comoros)@@@-12.25
